alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Teton (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 7:31PM MDT until August 25 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Teton County in north central Montana... Northwestern Cascade County in central Montana... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 730 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fort Shaw to near Sun River, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Fort Shaw, Fort Shaw and Sun River. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
